snippet.title: My Hotel Romance : Ep 01 "A complicated request" 🚫 +13 (English)
snippet.description:
Three men propose to you at the same time! Who are you going to choose?
You live surrounded by your three suitors: three handsome and very attractive men.
How will you end this dangerous and adult romance?

Kouga Inagami
Your ex who has returned from studying in the United States.
He studies at a hospitality institution and introduces himself to you as a fiancé candidate after becoming a professional manager.
A self-confident and very proud man.

Souta Miyoshi
Your childhood friend, who is also the only son of the owner of a hotel that competes with the hotel you work at.
A gentle and kind young man.

Ritsuki Himuro
Your hotel manager, who has been working with you for years. At first he was not a candidate, but he decides to join voluntarily.
A calm and trustworthy companion.

#geniusotome #myhotelromance #otomegame
